title: Deputy Manager / Assistant Manager (Pre-sales & Product Management)
skills: Strong analytical and problem solving ability

title: Senior Full-Stack Developer (PERN)
requirements: Solid backend knowledge: PostgreSQL, Express.js, Node.js for API design & data management collaboration.
Experience building & consuming RESTful APIs and handling asynchronous frontend data.
Comfortable with Git, CI/CD pipelines, Docker/Kubernetes, and deploying on cloud platforms like AWS, Vercel, Heroku.

title: Sr Software Engineer
requirements: Proficient in .NET 8, C#, Web API, and Vue.js.
Deep knowledge of SQL query writing and relational database design using SQL Server.
Experience in writing optimized, maintainable SQL code including complex joins, nested queries, indexing, and stored procedures.
Hands-on experience with Azure DevOps, Git version control, CI/CD pipelines, and deploying apps on Azure App Services.
Experience with Azure Service Bus or similar enterprise messaging systems.
Strong foundation in object-oriented programming, SOLID principles, and common design patterns.
Knowledge of security practices in financial application development.

title: Officer/Associate Manager, Cyber Threat Intelligence and SOC, Information Security
requirements: Strong knowledge of current security threats, techniques, and landscape, and a dedicated and self-driven desire to research and learn more about the information security landscape.

title: Team Leader (Full stack Developer)
requirements: In-depth knowledge of modern frontend and backend technologies such as JavaScript or TypeScript, React, Node.js, .NET or Java, and REST APIs
